means: 不同，有异( differ的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: You should not be judgemental about people and their differing sexualities.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不应对别人以及他们不同的性取向品头论足。

sentence.Network_en: There have been widely differing versions in the newspapers about the prison siege.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于围攻监狱一事，各家报纸众说纷纭，莫衷一是。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 裂变和分离过程所导致的差异运动（differing）和具体的差异（differences）是这种构建作用的产物或者效果。

list.abs: 字典中差字的解释 ... ◎ 差 chà (1) 区别[ difference] (1) 指派;派遣[ assign;dispatch;send on an errand].
...评价(金发维纳斯)(Blonde Venus,1932)显现再现系统中操纵女性，及父系制度中传授女性性欲为威胁的另一种方法。通过拜物化(fetishize)女性形象，男性尝试去否认其差异(difference)，另外，男性还让女性穿上他们的衣着，使之(雄性化)。影片中如此处理女主角，使女人之所以为女人的女性特质消失了，好似与男性相同。然而，我们会发现，因为父系的自恋倾向，这样反倒有了.
字典中乖字的解释 ... (4) 分离;离别[ separate] (1) 不同;差异[ different] (3) 反常;谬误[ abnormal;wrong].
人教版八年级上册英语单词表（含音标） ... 36 lifestyle n. 生活方式 41 different a. 不同的 42 difference n. 不同,差异.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... diet n. 饮食 differ v. 相异，有区别 difference n. 不同.

entry.def: If two or more things differ, they are unlike each other in some way.

example.ex: The story he told police differed from the one he told his mother...
example.tran: 他在警方和母亲那里说辞不一。

entry.def: If people differ about something, they do not agree with each other about it.

example.ex: The two leaders had differed on the issue of sanctions...
example.tran: 两位领导人在制裁问题上存在意见分歧。
那就是我俩看法不一的地方。

auth_sentence.content: He's not differing from what Ferguson told him.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's not differing from what Ferguson told him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's not differing from what Ferguson told him.

auth_sentence.content: There are differing views on the situation in Iraq.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are differing views on the situation in Iraq.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are differing views on the situation in Iraq.

auth_sentence.content: I surfaced...hard and softwoods at differing depths of cut.
auth_sentence.res_content: I surfaced...hard and softwoods at differing depths of cut.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I surfaced...hard and softwoods at differing depths of cut.
